abstract: Students at Fordham stage a bake sale to counter one at the University of California, Berkeley, last week that protested affirmative action in college admissions.
snippet: Students at Fordham stage a bake sale to counter one at the University of California, Berkeley, last week that protested affirmative action in college admissions.
lead_paragraph: In rebuttal to last week's controversial bake sale protesting affirmative action in college admissions at the University of California, Berkeley, students at Fordham University in New York staged their own sale on Friday.

headline.main: Fordham Holds Bake Sale in Response to Berkeley's
